attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it compulsory to have a dog licence the minimum of £250 a year, this way only serious dog lover's will pay, the money could be used to monitor them. Instead of them being neglected, mistreated and left in the gardens for the rest of thier lives barking thier heads off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
